citations.narrative:
The water receptacles in a red fox enclosure are unclean. Two receptacles from the previous 4 days, and a third
receptacle added the morning of inspection, contain an accumulation of leaves, dirt, and organic debris, leaving the
remaining water cloudy. Failure to provide clean, potable water may promote the growth of pathogens and predispose
animals to illness and discomfort. The facility must ensure all water receptacles are clean and sanitary.
Correct by 8/7/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
The water receptacles in a red fox enclosure are unclean. Two receptacles from the previous 4 days, and a third 
receptacle added the morning of inspection, contain an accumulation of leaves, dirt, and organic debris, leaving the 
remaining water cloudy. Failure to provide clean, potable water may promote the growth of pathogens and predispose 
animals to illness and discomfort. The facility must ensure all water receptacles are clean and sanitary. 
 
Correct by 8/7/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
